select.sql: select t.*,count(m.UserID) Players, t.NumPlayers-count(m.UserID) PlayersLeft from ft_tournaments t left outer join ft_tournament_members m on m.TournamentID=t.TournamentID where ('$id;'='' or '$id;'=t.TournamentID) group by t.TournamentID order by t.StatusID asc,t.Date desc

group.sql: select *,concat(Score1,'-',Score2) Score,concat('', Login,'') User from ft_groups where TournamentID='$tournament;' and Stage='$stage;' and Name='$group;' and UserID>0 order by Points desc, Score1-Score2 desc, ScorePoints desc, rand('$tournament;'*'$stage;'*'$group;')
